messages.subject: The last samurai
messages.msgSnippet: I have been chided, silently, by Bill, yes Glover was Scottish, the arms were American. and publicly, Lend lease was for the good guys. However that was our
messages.messageBody:
I have been chided,
silently, by Bill, yes Glover was Scottish, the arms were American.
and publicly, Lend lease was for the good guys. However that was our
government at work, the arms dealers were selling dive bombers to the
Nazies and submarines to the Japanese...
-t
